name: Shooter Arcade 0.1.0-BETA
description: Shooter Arcade is a rendition of a full game I'll be making soon called: "Shooter", which will have levels and story to it! I'm currently working on a boss to add to Shooter Arcade, which will randomly appear after a while! I might also add companions that you can buy, and they'll fight for you! Would you people want that? Let me know! Give me any suggestions actually!
